name: Soldier Of The Homeland: First Person
name_original: Soldier Of The Homeland: First Person
description:
Soldier Of The Homeland : Freedom Story is a free first person shooter set in a snowy environment.

 The story of the game is about an army soldier in a fictional country who defends his country against enemies invasion.

game features:

  1. Intense and exciting shooter gameplay
  2. Beautiful snowy environment
  3. Entertaining and simple story
  4. Realistic graphics
